SEARCH
Package dev.zpo.controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
dev.zpo.controller.StudentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/students") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class StudentController extends Object
RESTful API Controller for managing students. This controller provides endpoints for adding, deleting, and retrieving student information.

Endpoints:

  • GET /api/students/hello: Get a welcome message
  • POST /api/students/add: Add a new student
  • DELETE /api/students/{studentId}: Delete a student by ID

This controller handles HTTP requests related to students and delegates the processing to the StudentService. It follows REST principles to map HTTP methods and URIs to corresponding service methods.

Since:
2024-02-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ronald Frangulyan

    • hello

      @GetMapping("/hello") public String hello()
      Get a welcome message.
      Returns:

    • addStudent

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Student> addStudent(@RequestBody Student student)
      Add a new student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object to be added.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added student and HTTP status code 201 (Created) if successful, or an HTTP status code indicating failure.

    • deleteStudent

      @DeleteMapping("/{studentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteStudent(@PathVariable Long studentId)
      Delete a student by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status code 204 (No Content) if successful, or an HTTP status code indicating failure.
